title: An ancient Maya myth finds new life in a Mexican circus company’s performance
description: Mexican artistic director Jorge Díaz has created a unique stage adaptation of the Maya myth Popol Vuh. Inspired by bedtime stories he shared with his son, Díaz blends circus arts with theater in "Mortal Leap into Xib’alb’a." The show reimagines...

title: Data science helps Guyanese community preserve ancient Baboon Dance ritual
description: An interdisciplinary study released recently has revealed how artificial intelligence and data science can help preserve endangered indigenous cultural traditions.The research, combining ethnomusicology, digital humanities, machine learning, and geographic analysis, demonstrates that computational tools can document and protect fragile musical heritage while empowering the communities that created it.The article Data science helps Guyanese community preserve ancient Baboon Dance ritual appeared first on Stabroek News.

title: 'My favorite outdoor lighting project ever': How Martha Stewart Transformed an Ancient Apple Tree into a Breathtaking Christmas Statement With Just Warm Lights and Clear Ornaments
description: A winter tree becomes a canvas for festive expression on the media mogul's Bedford farm – and the beautiful look is exceedingly easy to recreate

title: Fossil experts celebrate 40 years of guided hunts on the Island
description: Island Gems Fossil Trips has celebrated 40 years of guided fossil hunts on the Isle of Wight.

title: Kashi Vishwanath to Konark Sun: Here are top 10 ancient temples of India
description: Ancient Temples: India is the homeland of temples; you can find them in every nook and corner. But did you know that even today, you can see thousands-of-years-old temples in India that still amaze the modern world?
